district_champion_caption: 21 and 22 December 2022 AD by District Administration, Patuakhali under the initiative of A2I and Information and Communication Technology Department. "Alor Pheri Pathagar" won the first place in the open category in the project exhibition competition of the Digital Innovation Olympiad at the Digital Innovation Fair-2022
prothom_alo_honor_caption: On behalf of "Prothom Alo-Bandhusabha" for contributing to the field of education by building a technology-based library in the student-teacher auditorium of Barisal University on 09 November 2021 AD. Md. Babul Mirdha, the founder of "Alor Feri Pathagar" was awarded meritorious honor on the date.
barishal_innovation_fair_2023_caption: Barisal Divisional Commissioner Amin Ul Ahsan, Divisional Additional Commissioner (General) Khondkar Anwar Hossain, Additional Secretary Khorsheda Yasmin, Additional Secretary Sheikh Momena Moni, and Barisal visited the stall of Alor Feri at the "Divisional Innovation Fair 2023" held at Ashwini Kumar Town Hall, Barisal on 7th and 8th June 2023.  During the visit, Md. Babul Mridha, the founder of Alor Ferry, highlighted the technical activities of Alor Feri.

smart_app_dev_training_2014_caption: Babul Mirdha, Resource Person at Smart Apps Development Training for University Teachers, taking award from Mr. Junaid Ahmed Palak, Honorable State Minister, Ministry of ICT, Bangladesh
